description: Namugoda Wijesinghe Atapattu Mudiyanselage Undawatte Keerthi Kumara Edward Weerasinghe and other Vs Manusha Nanayakkara Minister of Labour and Foreign Employment Ministry of Labour and Foreign Employment and others before Hon. B. Sasi Mahendran, J.
